system.description:
The ability to project a blast of mental energy at a single mind within SI×15 feet (SI×3 hex) and line of sight.

MS

causes the victim to accrue two Fatigue Levels (F2);

CS

inflicts four Fatigue Levels (F4).

After accruing the fatigue, the victim immediately makes a Shock Roll (Skills 22).

Psionic Episodes: Devastating headaches, dizziness, etc. for the character or innocent bystanders.

Misfire (CF): The invoker, or some randomly chosen person/animal nearby, suffers the talent’s full effect.
